oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Expanding the Dairy: Barn Design
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jones, Gordon A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: performance
comfort
ventilation
management
insulation
bedding
barn design
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: All in all, the orientation of the stalls is the least performance issue of these four tough decisions. As I see these problems, mattresses versus sand is a comfort issue. A four row barn versus a six row barn is a performance issue. Insulation versus no insulation is a ventilation issue, and head to head versus tail to tail is a management issue.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1995; 65-66
